I do appreciate the author for making this. It's art is nice and all, but the story is cliche. Generic stuffs, common common cliche. I was hoping for like a sudden call from the MC or even caught on scene then MC is made to watch the girl succumb to the cuck. But this is just normal cosplay sex. Other than the art, I don't really think there is anything good. Expected more as this is not as good as the first one. And everyone, please stop hating, the MC is not worth your pity. HE ONLY EXPECTS SOMETHING from the GF, he ain't doing shit to protect her. He got wimpy from just meeting the cuck's eyes. And there aren't even some comforting scene like "are u ok?". Do he even care?. If he can't MAN ENOUGH to protect his GF? This is bounded to happened. Lesson of the day: take care of your GF.

Can anyone explain to me how you can even fap to these sorts of generic NTR unless you identify with the meme tier goon fucking the thots in the works? I legit don't understand how someone can get off to being the stereotypical retarded/beta BFs in these works. Same 3-4 plots/tropes in like 98% of NTR stuff gets old fast and I'm not even trying to start shit, being legit serious its why most think NTR = shit. I'll take something different and might even like it (like Saimin Seishidou for example is good shit imo). Stuff like this just feels like a total waste of artistic talent with shitty writing I see all the time.
